page.title: 05Work
page.content: There are 85 people in this block who work outside the home. Crofting (small-scale farming) is the most common type of work. Roughly 24 people living in the area are crofters, either part or full time. The school provides full or part time work for 33 people though only 12 of these are resident within the block. 6 people work in shops. Fishing employs 5 people, some of these part time. 5 people work at a knitwear factory but only 2 of those actually live in the area. Salmon farming is just beginning in the area and provides part time jobs for 6 people on 2 farms. A mink farm and a sheepskin business each provide work for 1 person. A number of people work outside the block mainly in Lerwick or the Sullom Voe oil terminal.
